correctResponse: Great Job! Let's try the next one
incorrectResponse: Nice try, but missed. Let's try again

questions.q: We all know that girls who compete in sports perform better in school.
Sports broadcasting is very open now.
I never got into sports at all until i was in my early 20s.
Sports is like a war without the killing.

I don’t think there’s anything that is a greater area of discrimination against women today than the fact that nowhere in the world is there a female role model in team sports that more than half of a general audience would recognize.
I don’t want someone to watch sports in bed.
My priority is to turn people – especially kids – on to sports and being active so they don’t even have to think about it being good for their health.
The two major things that changed the makeup of all professional sports are money generated by television and courts that players went to in order to win their freedom as free agents.
My sister is totally my dad’s daughter because she loves sports.
